original_text: And they shall wander from sea to sea, and from the north even to the east, they shall run to and fro to seek the word of the Lord, and shall not find it.
korean_text: 사람이 이 바다에서 저 바다까지, 북쪽에서 동쪽까지 비틀거리며 여호와의 말씀을 구하려고 돌아다녀도 얻지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: And they shall wander from sea to sea
and from the north even to the east
they shall run to and fro
to seek the word of the Lord
